question_groups.title: Access to, and use of, the internet

questions.text: What percentage of people in the business' use internet-enabled devices for work purposes? Percentage of people using internet-enabled devices for work

Options: Yes, we use a fixed broadband connection
No, we do not use a fixed broadband connection
